verse: This is what the Lord God showed me: [look; behold] a basket of summer fruit.
He said to me, “Amos, what do you see?”

“On that day the ·palace [or temple] songs will become ·funeral songs [wailing],” says the Lord God. “·There will be dead bodies [Many bodies/corpses] thrown everywhere! ·Silence! [or …and carried out in silence.]”
